document.full_text: planned parenthood said on friday it would sue south dakota if gov. dennis daugaard signs an abortion bill requiring women to wait 72 hours before going through with the procedure.
document.title: group threatens to sue s. dakota over abortion bill
lines_and_colors: planned parenthood said on friday it would sue south dakota if gov. dennis daugaard signs an abortion bill requiring women to wait 72 hours before going through with the procedure.
